title: go.talks/present: can't swipe past 3rd page
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Any slide served via go.talks checkout:
$ hg sum
parent: 75:3e528b1bc474 tip

Or the version at http://talks.golang.org/
With chrome on android (I'm seeing this on Nexus 7 and Galaxy Nexus whatever the lastest
Android is)

2. Swipe right a few times.

What is the expected output?
The ability to swipe through full deck.

What do you see instead?
Stops at page 3.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
N/A

Which operating system are you using?
Android
